page.title: 17LOCAL SCHOOL & LIBRARY NEWS
page.content: The following items of local news appeared in the{SHROPSHIRE STAR}during the week{June19th-25th 1985}inclusive. Engineering science students at the { {PHOENIX SCHOOL,DAWLEY}were photographed with their{'A'level'} projects which included a variable pitch turbine. Claire Walton(15),who attends{PHOENIX {SCHOOL,DAWLEY}has designed and made a {'3D'}shop sign for a local hairdresser as part of her{'O'level}in art and design. Dawley Library is staging an exhibition to mark the 75th guiding anniversary.It was set up by{Dawley {district Girl Guides. An exhibition is currently running at Stirchley Library set up by{Telford's {Richard III Society.
